description:
In Viviter's multiplayer mode, where you can play "Chickempic" with up to 8 players, we're adding the "Halo Jump" mini-game!
Listen up, rookie! The key to infiltrating enemy territory is timing the parachute deployment!
Deploy it too early, and you'll be spotted by the enemy, but if you wait too long, you won't land safely. Press the button at the last possible moment. Understood?
Sir! Yes, sir!
name: Additional mini-game "Halo Jump!"
